sentences.en: Betty had no idea what male chauvinism was.
sentences.cn: 贝蒂不知道大男子主义是怎么回事.

sentences.en: Chauvinism is one quality that keeps people able to listen to and understand one another.
sentences.cn: 沙文主义是阻碍人们彼此互相了解的一项因素.

sentences.en: Even evidences of male chauvinism amongst her friends would infuriate her.
sentences.cn: 她的朋友中有谁流露出一点大男子主义的苗头,也会使她怒不可遏.

sentences.en: It may also appeal to the latent chauvinism of many ordinary people.
sentences.cn: 它可能也迎合了许多普通人心中的沙文主义情结。

sentences.en: Judy : That was a time of savageness and chauvinism.
sentences.cn: 那是个充斥着野蛮和沙文主义的年代.

sentences.en: Local - nationality chauvinism must be opposed too, but generally that is not where our emphasis lies.
sentences.cn: 地方民族主义也要反对, 但是那一般地不是重点.

sentences.en: The author lashed out against chauvinism.
sentences.cn: 作者猛烈抨击沙文主义.

sentences.en: The capitalists of our times continued vigorously to cultivate white chauvinism.
sentences.cn: 当代的资本家继续卖力地培养白种沙文主义.

sentences.en: The club is one of the last bastions of male chauvinism.
sentences.cn: 这个俱乐部是大男人主义的最后堡垒之一.

sentences.en: The economic law is productive power because of its benefit chauvinism.
sentences.cn: 经济法是效益本位,经济是质,法是形.

sentences.en: Then I would be met by lots of comments about my chauvinism and insensitivity.
sentences.cn: 然后我就会面对一对关于我沙文主义以及迟钝的批评.

sentences.en: They have since accused the Turks of neglecting the place in a spirit of chauvinism.
sentences.cn: 自从那时开始,他们就一直责怪土耳其人出于偏见故意忽视这个地方.

sentences.en: We resolutely oppose great power chauvinism.
sentences.cn: 我们坚决反对大国沙文主义.

sentences.en: We should get rid of great - power chauvinism resolutely, thoroughly, wholly and completely.
sentences.cn: 我们应当坚决 、 彻底、干净 、 全部地消灭大国沙文主义.

sentences.en: When she tried to become an engineer, she came up against a lot of male chauvinism.
sentences.cn: 当她试图成为工程师时, 她面对许多男性沙文主义.

words.tran_cn: 沙文主义的；盲目爱国的
沙文主义者；盲目的爱国者；沙文主义组织
沙文主义；盲目的爱国心

trans.tran_cn: 沙文主义，盲目的爱国心，本性别第一主义，男（女）性至上主义
trans.tran_en: a strong belief that your country or race is better or more important than any other
